se.kth.inda.indaprojekt.engine

Interface UnitImpacter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Enemy, FireBallProjectile, Projectile, ShockwaveBlast

    public interface UnitImpacter
    A UnitImpacter is an object that can hit other Units and affect them on impact.
    Author:
    David Masko

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRelevantTarget(Unit u)
      Checks if the given unit could be hit by this UnitImpacter and therefore if it is worth checking the Unit for impact.
      void onImpact(Unit u)
      Executes the effects that should happen on the impacted Unit when this UnitImpacter hits it.

    • Method Detail

      • onImpact

        void onImpact(Unit u)
        Executes the effects that should happen on the impacted Unit when this UnitImpacter hits it.
        Parameters:
        u - The Unit that has been hit.

      • isRelevantTarget

        boolean isRelevantTarget(Unit u)
        Checks if the given unit could be hit by this UnitImpacter and therefore if it is worth checking the Unit for impact.
        Parameters:
        u - The unit to check.
        Returns:
        True if the Unit could be hit by the UnitImpacter, returns false otherwise.
